metadata.name: ProjectTracker
metadata.description: Project management and milestone tracking for RAPP pipeline projects.

example.output: Project: CRM Integration. Status: On Track (78%). Sprint 4/6. Due: March 15. Blockers: None. Velocity: 42 pts/sprint.
Milestone 'Data Migration' marked complete. Next: Testing phase. Stakeholders notified.
Report generated: Executive summary, timeline, risks, budget status. Format: PDF. Sent to 5 stakeholders.
Notifications sent: 3 stakeholders (email), 2 stakeholders (Teams). Content: Weekly status update.
Velocity: 42 pts/sprint (target: 40). Trend: +5% over 4 sprints. Burndown: On track for deadline.

demoConversation.content: Give me status on the CRM Integration project.

**Project: CRM Integration**

**Status:** On Track (78% complete)
**Sprint:** 4 of 6
**Due:** March 15, 2025

**Milestones:**
- [x] Discovery & Planning
- [x] API Development
- [x] Data Migration
- [ ] Testing (In Progress - 60%)
- [ ] UAT
- [ ] Go-Live

**Blockers:** None
**Team Velocity:** 42 pts/sprint (target: 40)
